banner.description: WordPress Security Scanner by the WPScan Team

interesting_findings.to_s: XML-RPC seems to be enabled: https://www.group-activa.com/xmlrpc.php
The external WP-Cron seems to be enabled: https://www.group-activa.com/wp-cron.php

main_theme.description: Consulting - Business and Finance WordPress theme. Using Consluting you can easily create a modern website with real content. Easily edit the real content and compose the page layout with drag & drop page builder Consulting is the best ever finance, consulting, brokerage WordPress theme. It’s fully Responsive and Easy to Customize using intuitive Drag & Drop Visual Composer and Theme Options panel in WordPress Customizer.
main_theme.author: StylemixThemes
main_theme.license: GNU General Public License v2 or later
